results.title: Suspected statin-induced respiratory muscle myopathy during long-term inspiratory muscle training in a patient with diaphragmatic paralysis.
results.text_hl: He had a secondary diagnosis of @DISEASE_Hyperlipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D006949 @@@hyperlipidemia@@@, which was treated with 40 mg of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ after 5(1/2) months of IMT.
